statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{16 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x - 1 , -5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 5 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - x - 2 , -9 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 1 , -2 \, x^{2} + x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
